column2: "Hahaha! What a battle! It feels good to get a workout! I've been asleep for so long!"
"That didn't even faze him?!"
"He's still awakening, and yet our attacks are already futile. And, of course, retreating isn't an option."
"If he regains his full strength, then stopping him will not be possible."
"Damn it..."
"...<%me>! Take Echo and Sina and retreat!"
"Zeno, what are you saying? I'm going to stay and fight alongside you!"
"You're useless! I'm saying you should get out of the way!"

"Please, <%me>!
I'll buy you some time, so please at least save these two!"
"I'm with you, Zeno!"
"Casra..."
"Don't forget that I'm one of the Council of Six. We may still have a chance to escape after buying them some time."
"But... Zeno..."
"Shut up! Take the wounded, and retreat. That's an order, Echo!"

"Sorry, <%me>...
Please let me do this."
"As your mentor, it's my duty to set an example for you, especially in situations such as this."
"Zeno! Promise me! Promise me you'll come back alive! If you don't, I'll never forgive you!"
"I hear you! Now, shut up and go!"
"Are you ready, ARKS?"
"You were waiting for us? That's surprisingly considerate of you, Dark Falz."
"I have no interest in cowards who aren't willing to fight."
"Then I guess we had better rise to your expectations!"
"Let's do this!"
